author: Douglas Adams
message: Human beings, who are almost unique in having the ability to learn from the experience of others, are also remarkable for their apparent disinclination to do so.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Muriel Rukeyser
message: The universe is made of stories, not atoms.
title: Thought of the day

author: Frank Wright
message: Respect should be earned by actions, and not acquired by years.
title: Thought of the day
